channel.title: Politepix Public License and Library Credits – Politepix

item.title: Politepix Public License and Library Credits
item.dc:creator: jdkaire
item.description:
I finally finished a very simple app using OpenEars and the only part I have left is the credits screen. So,
1. I couldn’t find the Politepix Public License version 1.0. to read it. Can you tell me where it is?
2. Does anybody have a screenshot of how you are crediting the CMU libraries?

Thanks,

Joe

item.title: Reply To: Politepix Public License and Library Credits
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Congratulations on your app! Feel free to promote it in the sticky topic at the top of the forum once it’s accepted.

The license is at the root of the distribution, it’s called license.txt. It has some credit boilerplate language.

item.title: Reply To: Politepix Public License and Library Credits
item.dc:creator: jdkaire
item.description:
Halle,
Ah! Yes…I was looking all over the website and didn’t realize it was in the package. Thank you so much for your prompt reply.
